moves.name: Ice Fang
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of making the target flinch. Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.effect: The user takes up a counterattacking posture. Using this move again will cause the user to leave this posture, then attack. No other actions can be taken while in this posture. If hit by an attack move while in this counterattacking posture, the user leaves this posture, then the user attacks the target with double that power.

moves.name: Outstanding!
moves.effect: Makes opponents target the user for a short time. Raises the user’s Defense by 3 stat ranks.

passives.name: Clearheaded
passives.description: Prevents the user from becoming confused.
